creditline: Gift of Mom, Mary Haldeman Dayton, and her family
description: Oval sand painting with thick, rough, texture; white painted area on R and blue-gray color covering L and lower area; wood frame with silver face
dimension:
38 x 45 in. (96.52 x 114.3 cm) (canvas)
39 x 46 in. (99.06 x 116.84 cm) (outer frame)
title: Nebula of Lyra II
